Verses: 1 idho, Ivaigalellaavatraiyum En Kan Kandu, En Kaadhu Kettu Arindhirukkiradhu.
2 neengal Arindhirukkiradhai Naanum Arindhirukkiren; Naan Ungalukkuth Thaazhndhavan Alla.
3 sarvavallavarode Naan Pesinaal Nalladhu; Dhevanode Nyaayaththirkaaga Vazhakkaada Virumbuven.
4 neengal Poiyaip Pinaikkiravargal; Neengal Ellaarum Kaariyaththukkudhavaadha Vaiththiyargal.
5 neengal Pesaamalirundhaal Nalamaagum; Adhu Ungalukku Gnaanamaayirukkum.
6 neengal En Nyaayaththaikkettu, En Udhadugal Sollum Viseshangalai Gavaniyungal.
7 neengal Dhevanukkaaga Nyaayakkedaaip Pesi, Avarukkaaga Vanjagamaai Vasanikkavendumo?
8 avarukku Mugadhaatchiniyam Pannuveergalo? Dhevanukkaaga Vazhakkaaduveergalo?
9 avar Ungalai Aaraaindhupaarththaal Adhu Ungalukku Nalamaayirukkumo? Manushanaip Pariyaasampannugiradhupola Avaraip Pariyaasampannuveergalo?
10 neengal Andharangamaai Mugadhaatchiniyampanninaal, Avar Ungalai Evvidhaththilum Kandippaar.
11 avarudaiya Magaththuvam Ungalaith Thidukkidappannaadho? Avarudaiya Bayangaram Ungalaip Pidikkamaattaadho?
12 ungal Perai Ninaikkappannum Adaiyaalangal Saambalukku Sari; Ungal Mettimaigal Setrukkuviyalgalukku Samaanam,
13 neengal Mavunamaayirungal, Naan Pesugiren, Enakku Varugiradhu Varattum.
14 naan En Parkalinaal En Sadhaiyaip Pidungi, En Praananai En Kaiyile Vaippaanen?
15 avar Ennaik Kondrupottaalum, Avarmel Nambikkaiyaayiruppen; Aanaalum En Vazhigalai Avarukku Munbaaga Roobagaarampannuven.
16 avare En Ratchippu; Maayakkaarano Avar Sannidhiyil Seraan.
17 en Vasanaththaiyum, Naan Sollik Kaanbikkiradhaiyum, Ungal Sevigalaal Gavanamaaik Kelungal.
18 idho, En Nyaayangalai Aniyaniyaaga Vaiththen; En Needhi Vilangum Endru Ariven.
19 ennode Vazhakkaadavendumendru Irukkiravan Yaar? Naan Mavunamaayirundhaal Jeeviththuppovene.
20 irandu Kaariyangalaimaaththiram Enakku Seyyaadhiruppeeraaga; Appozhudhu Umadhu Mugaththukku Munbaaga Oliththukkollaadhiruppen.
21 ummudaiya Kaiyai Ennaivittu Dhoorappaduththum; Ummudaiya Bayangaram Ennaik Kalangappannaadhiruppadhaaga.
22 neer Kooppidum, Naan Uththaravukoduppen; Alladhu Naan Pesuven; Neer Enakku Marumozhi Sollum.
23 en Akkiramangalum Paavangalum Eththanai? En Meerudhalaiyum En Paavaththaiyum Enakku Unarththum.
24 neer Umadhu Mugaththai Maraiththu, Ennai Umakkup Pagaignanaaga Ennuvaanen?
25 kaatradiththa Sarugai Norukkuveero? Kaaindhupona Thurumbaip Pinthodaruveero?
26 magaa Kasappaana Theerppugalai Enperil Ezhudhugireer; En Siruvayadhin Akkiramangalai Enakkup Palikkappannugireer.
27 en Kaalgalaith Thozhuvadiththuppottu, En Vazhigalaiyellaam Kaavalpannugireer; En Kaaladigalil Adaiyaalaththaip Podugireer.
28 ippadippattavan Azhugippogira, Vasthupolavum, Pottariththa Vasthirampolavum Azhindhupovaan.
